S(zi)=ezi∑j=1Kezj[Softmax Function]LCE(y,S(z))=−∑j=1Kyjlog⁡S(zj)[Cross Entropy Loss]wi=wi−α×∂∂wiLCE(yi,S(zi))[Weight Update]=wi−α×xi(S(zi)−yi)w=w−α×1B∑i=1Bxi(S(zi)−yi)[Batch Weight Update]\begin{aligned} S(z_i) &= \frac{e^{z_i}}{\sum^{K}_{j=1} e^{z_j}} & \text{[Softmax Function]}\\ L_{\text{CE}}(y, S(z)) &= - \sum^{K}_{j=1} y_j \log S(z_j)& \text{[Cross Entropy Loss]}\\ w_i &= w_i - \alpha \times \frac{\partial}{\partial w_i} L_{\text{CE}}(y_i, S(z_i))& \text{[Weight Update]}\\ &= w_i - \alpha \times x_i(S(z_i) - y_i) &\\ w &= w - \alpha \times \frac{1}{B} \sum^{B}_{i=1}x_i(S(z_i) - y_i) & \text{[Batch Weight Update]}\\ \end{aligned}S(zi​)LCE​(y,S(z))wi​w​=∑j=1K​ezj​ezi​​=−j=1∑K​yj​logS(zj​)=wi​−α×∂wi​∂​LCE​(yi​,S(zi​))=wi​−α×xi​(S(zi​)−yi​)=w−α×B1​i=1∑B​xi​(S(zi​)−yi​)​[Softmax Function][Cross Entropy Loss][Weight Update][Batch Weight Update]​

Derivations

Derivative of arbitrary sigmoid output S(zj)S(z_j)S(zj​) with respect to arbitrary linear combination output ziz_izi​:

∂S(zj)∂zi=∂∂ziezj∑k=1Kezk=∂∂ziezj(∑k=1Kezk)−ezj(∂∂zi∑k=1Kezk)(∑k=1Kezk)2={∂∂ziezj(∑k=1Kezk)−ezj(∂∂zi∑k=1Kezk)(∑k=1Kezk)2i=j∂∂ziezj(∑k=1Kezk)−ezj(∂∂zi∑k=1Kezk)(∑k=1Kezk)2i≠j={ezi(∑k=1Kezk)−(ezi)2(∑k=1Kezk)2i=j0−ezjezi(∑k=1Kezk)2i≠j={S(zi)(1−S(zi))i=j−S(zj)S(zi)i≠j=S(zi)(δi,j−S(zj))\begin{aligned} \frac{\partial S(z_j) }{\partial z_i} &= \frac{\partial}{\partial z_i} \frac{e^{z_j}}{\sum^{K}_{k=1}e^{z_k}}\\\\ &= \frac{\frac{\partial}{\partial z_i} e^{z_j} (\sum^{K}_{k=1}e^{z_k}) - e^{z_j} (\frac{\partial}{\partial z_i} \sum^{K}_{k=1}e^{z_k})}{(\sum^{K}_{k=1}e^{z_k})^2}\\\\ &= \begin{cases} \frac{\frac{\partial}{\partial z_i} e^{z_j} (\sum^{K}_{k=1}e^{z_k}) - e^{z_j} (\frac{\partial}{\partial z_i} \sum^{K}_{k=1}e^{z_k})}{(\sum^{K}_{k=1}e^{z_k})^2} & i = j\\\\ \frac{\frac{\partial}{\partial z_i} e^{z_j} (\sum^{K}_{k=1}e^{z_k}) - e^{z_j} (\frac{\partial}{\partial z_i} \sum^{K}_{k=1}e^{z_k})}{(\sum^{K}_{k=1}e^{z_k})^2} & i \neq j\\ \end{cases}\\\\ &= \begin{cases} \frac{e^{z_i} (\sum^{K}_{k=1}e^{z_k}) - (e^{z_i})^2 }{(\sum^{K}_{k=1}e^{z_k})^2} & i = j\\\\ \frac{0 - e^{z_j}e^{z_i} }{(\sum^{K}_{k=1}e^{z_k})^2} & i \neq j\\ \end{cases}\\\\ &= \begin{cases} S(z_i)(1 - S(z_i)) & i = j\\ -S(z_j)S(z_i) & i \neq j\\ \end{cases}\\\\ &= S(z_i)(\delta_{i,j} - S(z_j)) \\ \end{aligned}∂zi​∂S(zj​)​​=∂zi​∂​∑k=1K​ezk​ezj​​=(∑k=1K​ezk​)2∂zi​∂​ezj​(∑k=1K​ezk​)−ezj​(∂zi​∂​∑k=1K​ezk​)​=⎩⎪⎪⎪⎪⎨⎪⎪⎪⎪⎧​(∑k=1K​ezk​)2∂zi​∂​ezj​(∑k=1K​ezk​)−ezj​(∂zi​∂​∑k=1K​ezk​)​(∑k=1K​ezk​)2∂zi​∂​ezj​(∑k=1K​ezk​)−ezj​(∂zi​∂​∑k=1K​ezk​)​​i=ji=j​=⎩⎪⎪⎪⎨⎪⎪⎪⎧​(∑k=1K​ezk​)2ezi​(∑k=1K​ezk​)−(ezi​)2​(∑k=1K​ezk​)20−ezj​ezi​​​i=ji=j​={S(zi​)(1−S(zi​))−S(zj​)S(zi​)​i=ji=j​=S(zi​)(δi,j​−S(zj​))​

Derivative of loss with respect to arbitrary linear combination output ziz_izi​:

∂L∂zi=−∑k=1Kyklog⁡S(zk)=−[yiS(zi)S(zi)(1−S(zi))−∑k≠iKykS(zk)(S(zk)S(zi))]=−[yi(1−S(zi))−∑k≠iKykS(zi)]=−[yi−S(zi)yi−∑k≠iKS(zi)yk]=−[yi−∑k=1KS(zi)yk]=−[yi−S(zi)∑k=1Kyk]=S(zi)−yi\begin{aligned} \frac{\partial L}{\partial z_i} &= - \sum^{K}_{k=1} y_k \log S(z_k) \\ &= - \left[ \frac{y_i}{S(z_i)}S(z_i)(1 - S(z_i)) - \sum^{K}_{k\neq i} \frac{y_k}{S(z_k)}(S(z_k)S(z_i)) \right]\\\\ &= - \left[ y_i(1 - S(z_i)) - \sum^{K}_{k\neq i} y_k S(z_i) \right]\\\\ &= - \left[ y_i - S(z_i) y_i - \sum^{K}_{k\neq i} S(z_i) y_k \right]\\\\ &= - \left[ y_i - \sum^{K}_{k=1} S(z_i) y_k \right]\\\\ &= - \left[ y_i - S(z_i) \sum^{K}_{k=1} y_k \right]\\\\ &= S(z_i) - y_i\\\\ \end{aligned}∂zi​∂L​​=−k=1∑K​yk​logS(zk​)=−⎣⎢⎡​S(zi​)yi​​S(zi​)(1−S(zi​))−k=i∑K​S(zk​)yk​​(S(zk​)S(zi​))⎦⎥⎤​=−⎣⎢⎡​yi​(1−S(zi​))−k=i∑K​yk​S(zi​)⎦⎥⎤​=−⎣⎢⎡​yi​−S(zi​)yi​−k=i∑K​S(zi​)yk​⎦⎥⎤​=−[yi​−k=1∑K​S(zi​)yk​]=−[yi​−S(zi​)k=1∑K​yk​]=S(zi​)−yi​​

Derivative of weight wiw_iwi​ with respect to linear combination ziz_izi​:

∂zi∂wi=∂∂wiwi×xi=xi\begin{aligned} \frac{\partial z_i}{\partial w_i} &= \frac{\partial}{\partial w_i} w_i \times x_i\\ &= x_i \end{aligned}∂wi​∂zi​​​=∂wi​∂​wi​×xi​=xi​​

Derivative of weight wiw_iwi​ with respect to loss:

∂L∂wi=∂zi∂wi∂L∂zi=xi(S(zi)−yi)\begin{aligned} \frac{\partial L}{\partial w_i} &= \frac{\partial z_i}{\partial w_i}\frac{\partial L}{\partial z_i}\\ &= x_i (S(z_i) - y_i)\\ \end{aligned}∂wi​∂L​​=∂wi​∂zi​​∂zi​∂L​=xi​(S(zi​)−yi​)​
